title: Poster, "Tokyo Communication Arts", 1991
signed: Signed in print, lower left corner:  Paul Rand
description: On white ground, six differently colored, mostly overlapping, slightly irregular squares, scattered on the sheet.  From upper right corner the squares are:  orange, green, red, pink, purple, and dark green.  In an empty space to right of center, is a bee (IBM logo) composed of four diagonal black stripes; two black circles; and wings composed of tiny black circles. In lower right quadrant, in six lines:  Tokyo Communication Arts, Osaka Communication Arts.
